channel.title: Stop monsters healing.. on delta
channel.description:
Hey i was wondering how come every time i attk general gwardor on my server wich is delta/xscape base it radomly heals and is impossible to kill it..
can anyone tell me how to remove this please (so he stops healing) ?
Help will be appreciated
Thanks

item.title: Stop monsters healing.. on delta
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

he is made to heal…its to make him hard to kill, as he is a lvl 600+ -.- only a team can kill him, thats the point of gwd

Read full topic
